com.cmput3owo1.moodlet.adapters

Class MoodEventAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<MoodEventAdapter.ViewHolder>
      • com.cmput3owo1.moodlet.adapters.MoodEventAdapter

  • public class MoodEventAdapter
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<MoodEventAdapter.ViewHolder>
    This class is the adapter class to a RecyclerView containing MoodEventAdapter.ViewHolder objects The purpose is to create the MoodEventAdapter.ViewHolder objects that will display the data of user's mood events by converting it to a position in the view of the RecyclerView

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  MoodEventAdapter.OnItemClickListener
      Listener interface to get the position of a mood event upon a click on the RecyclerView
      class  MoodEventAdapter.ViewHolder
      ViewHolder that holds the views of the feed of a user's mood event history list

        public void onBindViewHolder(@NonNull
                             MoodEventAdapter.ViewHolder holder,
                             int position)
        Called by RecyclerView to display the data at the specified position. This method will update the contents of itemView to reflect the item at the given position
